text: Roman Valeryevich Murtazayev (; born 10 September 1993) is a Kazakh footballer who plays for FC Tobol, and the Kazakhstan national football team. ==Career== ===Club=== In December 2015, Murtazayev signed for FC Irtysh Pavlodar. On 24 August 2016, FC Astana announced that they had signed Murtazayev to a three- year contract, from the end of the 2016 season. Murtazayev left Astana at the end of his contract on 25 December 2019.
